item.title: nala
item.description: Install from here: https://gitlab.com/volian/nala/-/wikis/Installation Run sudo nala fetch to test available package mirrors and pick the fast/reliable ones.

item.title: Unattended Upgrades
item.description: Config for apt on [[notes/OS/Ubuntu]]: 1 /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/50unattended-upgrades To disable auto-updating nvidia / [[cuda]] packages: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 // Python regular expressions, matching packages to exclude from upgrading Unattended-Upgrade::Package-Blacklist { // Do not upgrade nvidia stuff "nvidia*"; "libnvidia*"; "cuda*"; // .
